title: 新版本出床了!?
author: zetapluswpy
txt_content:
http://www.minecraftwiki.net/wiki/Version_history
看來大家對床的怨念太深了!?

replies.author: w_stan
darkcatcat
replies.txt_content: 在晚間12點時就更新城1.3版了

replies.author: vstone
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 猫了个咪
replies.txt_content: 这个好，之前夜晚无所事事我就傻站着等天亮，同时用手机看小说，要不就带一堆铲子下地底挖矿去

replies.author: kkkppp
replies.txt_content: 还出了半层木板，可以建个不会着火的木屋..

replies.author: liu3312776
replies.txt_content: .....还看到了好像变阻器的东西..........

replies.author: windleft
replies.txt_content:
這個床增加了一些驚險要素。
怪物可能把你吵醒，即使你在封閉的房間里。

replies.author: 真·nangdei
replies.txt_content: 话说床怎么合成……

replies.author: foxmy66
replies.txt_content: 回复 9 # 真·nangdei 的帖子

replies.author: 张金
replies.txt_content: 好床啊！！

replies.author: tony1233465
replies.txt_content: 太好啦,很愛床呀 ^^

replies.author: asb77417
replies.txt_content:
kuyama516 发表于 2011-2-23 19:44 
When you try to sleep in a bed which light level is too much(it's near torch/lava) skeleton will be  ...
會的......會有怪物來叫你起床= = 和平好像不會

嗯床是好东西  我最喜欢的功能是能当重生点用……
